file_content.text: Enjoy your Republic victory. Balmorra was better off fighting the Empire.
The Barrager's destroyed... I didn't think I would live to see it. Thank you.
The Barrager's taking this lab with her, but she won't take us. Move!
Come in, Doctor Carsiri. Is anyone there?
We're here, Commander. Darth Minax and the other Imperials are dead. The Barrager's ready to accept your spike.
Excellent. Use the Barrager spike to get control. I'm sending a recovery crew to take over operations.
To take over? But the Barrager is a threat to Balmorra--it must be destroyed! You know that!
The Empire will never have control of the Barrager again.
It's not a threat anymore.
The Empire was never the problem. The Barrager itself caused this mess.
Did I miss something?
What's wrong is that your commander is willing to sacrifice Balmorra for a Republic victory.
Destroying a fleet takes every bit of power a planet can give. Solar, geothermal, hydro... if it's part of Balmorra, it's powering the Barrager.
It will leave the planet an empty shell--with nothing left to defend.
The Empire wanted the Barrager so they could hold Balmorra forever. Now I see the Republic does, too. Commander Madine lied to us.
I'm sure the commander wants to keep Balmorra safe.
We're trying to help.
Neither of us knows the commander's true intentions.
Don't assume things.
The commander wouldn't have authorized this if he'd known.
That can't be true.
I'm sure the commander had a good reason. Don't ask me what.
Just take it easy.
Is this true, Commander?
Let's hear his story.
Whatever your assumptions, doctor, I made it clear that we needed to get control of the Barrager.
You never said the Republic planned to use it!
A Madine has died in every Republic war--how dare you accuse me of treason.
You really think we'd destroy something that could prevent another Telos, Taris or Coruscant? Save millions of lives and guarantee a Republic victory?
This war's not over. I can feel it. I know the cost is high, but the Barrager could make sure the Republic wins that war. We have to claim it.
We can't sacrifice one planet to save another.
It's too costly. Destroy it.
Blast it, do you realize what you're doing? You've given the Empire a second chance--
The Empire must be defeated. The Barrager belongs to the Republic.
We need weapons. Take it.
Almost. Use the Barrager spike to take control.
The Barrager's yours. Now the Empire won't destroy Balmorra. I never thought it would be the Republic instead.
I'm sorry, doctor, but we had no choice. Get back to Bugtown and meet me in Republic headquarters. Madine out.
The Barrager's made slaves of us all.
The Barrager's power core is overloading. We have to evacuate.
Running for my life. Next time, I'll leave the adventures to a professional. If we don't meet again--thank you.
Many traitors met their ends on my lightsaber.
I hate liars.
I disconnected him. Give me the Barrager spike so we can destroy this accursed thing.
I'm in no mood for this.
I don't like liars.
